summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of the runner registry, covering aspects such as report generation in different formats, merging results from multiple IaC frameworks, handling empty or missing inputs, extracting repository metadata, filtering files, and categorizing code runners.
business_intent: To ensure that the runner registry reliably aggregates and formats scan results across various infrastructure-as-code frameworks, supports configurable output options, and correctly captures metadata needed for CI/CD pipelines and compliance reporting.
